snippet.title: INVERSUS - Versus Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/inversus-ps4/

Enter the arena in INVERSUS. Play 1v1 or 2v2 with friends online and on the couch. http://www.inversusgame.com 

INVERSUS is a minimalist action-strategy shooter for one to four friends. Player movement is constrained to opposite colors of a black and white grid. My walls are your paths and your walls are my paths. Each shot flips tile colors in an attempt to block, trap and close in on the enemy. Firing a bullet opens up a path for you while also closing off a path for me. Both online and local couch play are supported. The competitive versus mode pits players against each other in 1v1 or 2v2 battles. The single-player and cooperative two-player modes pit players against endless waves of enemies as they fight for high scores on an ever-changing board.

http://www.inversusgame.com

INVERSUS © 2016 Hypersect LLC. All rights reserved.
